title: Celine Dion
summary: Céline Marie Claudette Dion CC OQ (/seɪˌliːn diˈɒn/,[1] born 30 March 1968)[2] is a Canadian singer. She is noted for her powerful, technically skilled vocals and high-grossing tours.[3][4] Dion is the best-selling Canadian recording artist[5] and French language artist of all time.[6][7] Dion's music has incorporated genres such as pop, rock, R&B, gospel and classical music.
